issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When an unknown EMI is provided in RunInstances parameter, it fails with the following error, {noformat} euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (500, 'Internal Server Error', 'InternalFailure', 'Failed to send message RunInstancesType to service EucalyptusRequestQueueSync because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmControl.component}. Message payload is of type: RunInstancesType') {noformat} Detail log: {noformat} [root@a-26 ~]# euca-run-instances -k sshlogin emi-e0e7c4b8 --debug 2014-04-08 03:57:26,664 DEBUG RunInstances parsed arguments: {'user_data': None, 'iam_profile': None, 'Placement.GroupName': None, 'EbsOptimized': None, 'RamdiskId': None, 'subnet': None, 'group': [], 'key_id': None, 'Monitoring.Enabled': None, fields.summary: Instance run fails with "500 Internal Server Error" when unknown EMI is provided

comments.body:
git branch dev/ethomas/EUCA-9093
git show 649634683f23cc110b2ed3cc2f3195d618b1fd0b

Created an exception NoSuchImageIdException, check for it during runInstance(), throw it when the message that generated it occurs.
The fix looks good to me.
